events.name: AFTERWORK ASF
events.description: Find out more about ASF at this afterwork! Atlantique Sans Fronti√®res is the school's charitable association, which organizes events on a variety of scales (global and local). If you're tempted by a human adventure, this is the association for you!

events.name: TONUS BDE
events.description: It's the last BDE tonic of the integration process, and a warm-up for the WEI. Don't miss it!
